file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 52-44-03-04 - CONFIG-2 - REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT VENT DOOR - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT VENT DOOR - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the Vent Door. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ACFT MODEL(S) 52-44-03-000-801-A VENT DOOR - REMOVAL EMB-135 ACFT MODEL(S) REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT 52-44-03-400-801-A EMB-135 DOOR - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-2 52-44-03 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-44-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 2. VENT DOOR - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the vent door. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT DOOR - RE- AMM TASK 52-44-01-000-801-A/400 MOVAL C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Fuselage Rear Section I D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the vent door available E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Protective Gloves For protection of technicians hands 1 available Commercially Safety Goggles For protection of technicians eyes 1 available F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) ASTM D740 Methyl Ethyl Ketone - (MEK) AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task On the rear electronic-compartment door EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 52-44-03 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-004-A (1) Make sure that the aircraft is safe for maintenance. (2) Remove the rear electronic-compartment door ( AMM TASK 52-44-01-000-801-A/400). (3) Put the rear electronic-compartment door on a safe surface to prevent damage. J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-004-A (1) Remove the nuts (5) and washers (6). (2) Remove the arms () and shims (2). (3) Remove the bolts (7). (4) Remove the vent door (1). WARNING: BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU USE SOLVENTS BECAUSE THEY ARE A HEALTH FIRE HAZARD. USE SAFETY GOGGLES AND PROTECTIVE CLOTHING. DO NOT BREATHE THE SOLVENT GASES AND WORK IN A WELL VENTILATED AREA. (5) Clean the surface with a cloth wet with MEK. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 52-44-03 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-44-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 3. REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT DOOR - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the Rear Electronic-Compartment Door. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 21-31-00-700-805-A/500 - AMM TASK 21-31-00-700-808-A/500 - REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT DOOR - IN- AMM TASK 52-44-01-400-801-A/400 STALLATION IPC 52-44-00 REAR ELECTRONIC BAY DOOR C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Fuselage Rear Section I D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the vent door available E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Protective Gloves For protection of technicians hands 1 available Commercially Safety Goggles For protection of technicians eyes 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expendable Parts IPC REFERENCE ITEM QTY (VENDOR REFERENCE) Vent Door IPC 52-44-00 1 H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task On the rear electronic-compartment door EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 52-44-03 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-004-A (1) Install the bolts (7) in the vent door (1). (2) Install the arms (4) and shims (2). (3) Install the nuts (5) and washers (6). (4) Close the vent door (1). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-004-A (1) Install the rear electronic-compartment door ( AMM TASK 52-44-01-400-801-A/400). (2) Do a functional test for cabin leakage (AMM TASK 21-31-00-700-805-A/500) or (AMM TASK 21-31-00-700-808-A/500). If the values are permitted, you can operate the aircraft. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 52-44-03 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
